record.name: Manager Mailbox Access
record.description: For an Exchange Mailbox for an employee who has left the company, use this form to grant manager access of the Primary Exchange Mailbox. Access is granted for 10 business days. Extended access can be obtained based on business justification.
record.detailedDescription: For an Exchange Mailbox for an employee who has left the company, use this form to grant manager access of the Primary Exchange Mailbox. Access is granted for 10 business days. Extended access can be obtained based on business justification.
